title: Encore: Sir Luck and Mister Riches
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In this favorite tale from the archives, comedian/kids' author Michael Ian Black (I'm Worried, Cock-a-Doodle-Doo-Bop) and actor/director David Wain (Wet Hot American Summer, Medical Police) believe they know the secret to what makes people truly happy.
itunes:author: WBUR
